sys_script_include.description: Created a separate Utils as having issues with the original NeedItUtils
sys_script_include.name: NeedItExtendedUtils

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_25a6a74997342110979cfef3a253af0e
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_58872_needit.NeedItExtendedUtils</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description>Created a separate Utils as having issues with the original NeedItUtils</description><name>NeedItExtendedUtils</name><script><![CDATA[var NeedItExtendedUtils = Class.create();
NeedItExtendedUtils.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

    countGroupMembers: function() {

        var grpName = "";
        var groupID = this.getParameter('sysparm_group_id');

        var grpMems = new GlideRecord('sys_user_grmember');
        grpMems.addQuery('group.sys_id', groupID);
        grpMems.query();

        if (grpMems.next()) {
            grpName = grpMems.getDisplayValue('group');
            gs.error("mh - " + grpName);
        }
        if (grpName != "") {
            var grpMemRowCount = grpMems.getRowCount();
            gs.error("mh - " + grpMemRowCount);
        }
        return grpMemRowCount;
    },

    type: 'NeedItExtendedUtils'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>servicenow@sccnow.onmicrosoft.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-02-02 14:15:35</sys_created_on><sys_id>25a6a74997342110979cfef3a253af0e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>NeedItExtendedUtils</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_25a6a74997342110979cfef3a253af0e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>servicenow@sccnow.onmicrosoft.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-02-02 14:18:32</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
